price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߋ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߖߌ߫ ߔߌߦߐߔߌߦߐ ߘߌ߫ ߛߖߌ߫ ߟߊߓߐ߲߬ߕߊ ߘߐ߫ ߘߍ߫؟
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
